Name: Aragorn
Text: still working. I can hardly catch my breath

Name: Astrea
Text: Oh, that golem certainly gave you trouble. Yet here you are extraordinarily so full of life.

Name: Aragorn
Text: haha, that's true. I'm not dead yet!

Name: Astrea
Text: That's right not yet. You have one more area to go. After that you'll reach the end.

Name: Aragorn
Text: That's good. I just hope my armor lasts. It has been a while since Celestina last helped me take care of it.
